description: Prometheus produced quality plan with no code edits, proper artifact location

messages.user: Plan the implementation for adding real-time notifications

messages.assistant: I'll create a comprehensive implementation plan for the notification system.

tool_calls.name: Write
tool_calls.output:
# Notification System Implementation Plan

## Context
Adding real-time notifications to the existing REST API.

## Tasks
- [ ] Task 1: Set up WebSocket server alongside Express
- [ ] Task 2: Create notification service with pub/sub pattern
- [ ] Task 3: Add notification endpoints (GET /notifications, POST /notifications/read)
- [ ] Task 4: Implement client connection management
- [ ] Task 5: Add notification persistence to database
- [ ] Task 6: Write integration tests for WebSocket connections

## Verification
- Run `npm test` — all existing + new tests pass
- Run `npx tsc --noEmit` — no type errors
- Manual test: connect WebSocket client and verify message delivery
